name: certainty
content:
certainty noun
(IN NO DOUBT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] something that cannot be doubted: There are few absolute certainties in life.
B2 [ U ] the state of being completely confident or having no doubt about something: I'm unable to answer that question with any certainty.
More examplesFewer examplesSomehow she knew, with deep-down certainty, that her son was still alive.Each one of us faces the certainty that we are going to die.I can't say I'm certain they'll win, because there are no certainties in life, but they've got an excellent chance.Can you state with certainty that this is the same man you saw on that day?He stood up and declared his faith with absolute certainty.
